taskbody.prereq: The build of the package has been completed successfully providing a 'war' file.
taskbody.context:
This task describes how to deploy the war file using the JBOSS console.
The war file can also be deployed by using the OS copy/paste commands or the jBoss command line. Deployment of the war file will depend on the application server being used.

step.cmd: Sign in as admin and enter password.
Select the war file from your file system.
Click the En/Disable button to deploy the war.

taskbody.result: If found OK the war is added as disabled. A message confirms successful (or failed) deployment. Once deployed, the project can be verified using a standard tool such as Chrome Browser or Google's Postman utility.
